VisualShape3D
  • »
  • Welcome to VisualShape3D !
  • Chinese
The VisualShape3D aims at predicting shadows of solar beam on windows/walls in building or on panels of solar cells/collectors, and we first defined some geometrical functions specific for the purpose.
